Test Properties Module

Pytest fixtures for testing PROTEUS properties.

proteus.tests.properties.fixtures.create_property(property_tag, name, category, value, choices=None) → tuple[proteus.model.property.Property, str, str]

It creates a PROTEUS property using the tag, name, category and value passed as arguments. It returns a tuple containing the new property, the name, and the category values, which are set to default in case they were not set.

Pytest file for PROTEUS boolean properties.

proteus.tests.properties.test_boolean_properties.test_boolean_properties(name, category, value, expected_value, expected_xml_value, new_value, expected_new_value, expected_new_xml_value)

It tests creation, update, and evolution (cloning with a new value) of boolean properties.

Pytest file for PROTEUS class list properties.

proteus.tests.properties.test_classlist_properties.test_classlist_properties(name, category, value, expected_value, expected_value_as_list, new_value, new_expected_value, new_expected_value_as_list)

It tests creation, cloning, and evolution (cloning with a new value) of classlist properties.

Pytest file for PROTEUS date properties.

proteus.tests.properties.test_date_properties.test_date_properties(name, category, value, expected_value, new_value, expected_new_value)

It tests creation, update, and evolution (cloning with a new value) of date properties.

Pytest file for PROTEUS enum properties.

proteus.tests.properties.test_enum_properties.test_enum_properties(name, category, value, choices, expected_value, expected_choices, new_value)

It tests creation, update, and evolution (cloning with a new value) of enum properties.

This module contains the tests for the file property.

proteus.tests.properties.test_file_properties.test_file_properties(name, category, value, is_file_expected, new_value, is_file_new_expected)

It tests creation, update, and evolution (cloning with a new value) of file properties.

Pytest file for PROTEUS float properties.

proteus.tests.properties.test_float_properties.test_float_properties(name, category, value, expected_value, new_value, expected_new_value)

It tests creation, update, and evolution (cloning with a new value) of float properties.

Pytest file for PROTEUS Integer properties.

proteus.tests.properties.test_integer_properties.test_integer_properties(name, category, value, expected_value, new_value, expected_new_value)

It tests creation, update, and evolution (cloning with a new value) of Integer properties.

Pytest file for PROTEUS properties (general).

proteus.tests.properties.test_properties.test_property_name_and_category(name, name_expected, category, category_expected)

It tests whether a (string) property is correctly created with and without name and category.

proteus.tests.properties.test_properties.test_wrong_property_tag(property_tag, name, category, value)

It tests that PropertyFactory returns None when the XML element is not a property element.

Pytest file for PROTEUS string and markdown properties.

proteus.tests.properties.test_string_properties.test_string_and_markdown_properties(property_tag, name, category, value, new_value)

It tests creation, update, and evolution (cloning with a new value) of string and markdown properties.

Test file for PROTEUS Time properties.

It tests creation, update, and evolution (cloning with a new value) of time properties.

Pytest file for PROTEUS url properties.

proteus.tests.properties.test_url_properties.test_url_properties(name, category, value, is_valid_value, new_value, is_valid_new_value)

It tests creation, update, and evolution (cloning with a new value) of url properties.
